item.title: 民主党众议员亚当-希夫（Adam Schiff）指责前特别顾问罗伯特-赫尔（Robert Hur）将有关拜登总统记忆的言论包括在内，是为了 "用这种语言点燃政治风暴"。你很清楚自己在做什么"。
item.description:
Democratic Rep. Adam Schiff accuses former special counsel Robert Hur of including remarks about Pres. Biden's memory to "ignite a political firestorm with that language."

"You were not born yesterday. You understood exactly what you were doing." https://t.co/NMYOZjhwGL pic.twitter.com/SfaRZ1J95p

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: Ke Huy Quan 分享了他在 2024 年奥斯卡颁奖典礼上拍摄的所有星光熠熠的照片。
item.description:
Ke Huy Quan has shared a roundup of all the star-studded snaps he took at the 2024 Oscars. https://t.co/HilWE9B7JQ

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: 斯科特-彼得森（Scott Peterson）20 年前因杀害妻子和未出世的儿子而被定罪，在洛杉矶清白计划今年早些时候接手他的谋杀案后，他将于周二出庭受审。
item.description:
Scott Peterson, who was convicted of killing his wife and their unborn son 20 years ago, is scheduled to appear in court virtually Tuesday after the L.A. Innocence Project picked up his murder case earlier this year. https://t.co/La5LeEwM2P

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: 研究人员确认了据信是世界上已知最古老的口红--一个装有深红色膏状物的华丽小石瓶。这件罕见的文物是在伊朗东南部发现的。
item.description:
Researchers have identified what is believed to be the world's oldest known lipstick – a small, ornate stone vial containing a deep red paste.

The rare artifact was discovered in southeastern Iran. https://t.co/T6Y8mz8yQi

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: 新消息：周二上午，美国宾夕法尼亚州发生一起房屋爆炸和火灾，当局在现场发现两人死亡。
item.description:
NEW: Two people were found dead at the scene of a house explosion and fire in Pennsylvania on Tuesday morning, authorities said. https://t.co/EfaVohbyvL

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: 密苏里大学一名 22 岁的学生在访问纳什维尔时失踪，据当局称，该学生的家人正急切地寻找相关信息。
item.description:
The family of a University of Missouri student is desperate for information after the 22-year-old went missing while visiting Nashville, according to authorities. https://t.co/gOf2Vh9MBa

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: 杨紫琼正在澄清奥斯卡颁奖典礼上的一个小误会。这位明星在 Instagram 上解释了她把奥斯卡最佳女主角奖杯递给詹妮弗-劳伦斯时，《可怜的事》女主角艾玛-斯通（Emma Stone）在周日登台时弄错了。
item.description:
Michelle Yeoh is clearing up a little confusion from the Oscars.

The star took to Instagram to explain the mixup of her handing the Best Actress Oscar to Jennifer Lawrence when "Poor Things" star Emma Stone arrived on stage Sunday. https://t.co/pCURfr7hvF

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: 卫星图像显示，以色列军方正在延长和扩建一条加沙公路，现在这条公路横贯加沙全境。扩建工程为利用新的基础设施运送人道主义援助提供了可能。
item.description:
A Gaza road being extended and expanded for use by the Israeli military now runs across the full width of Gaza, satellite imagery shows.

The expansion opens the possibility that humanitarian aid could be delivered using the new infrastructure. https://t.co/T7QS0UpaMm

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: 具有分裂倾向的社交媒体名人安德鲁-泰特（Andrew Tate）和他的兄弟在罗马尼亚被拘留，并收到了英国签发的逮捕令。
item.description:
Divisive social media personality Andrew Tate and his brother were detained in Romania and handed arrest warrants issued by the U.K., a spokesperson for the pair confirmed Tuesday. https://t.co/R5aRwKX9Pj pic.twitter.com/fQe6obTjUr

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: 四届格莱美奖得主 SZA 公开了她取出隆胸假体的决定。
item.description:
Four-time Grammy winner SZA is opening up about her decision to get her breast implants removed. https://t.co/neVrgyKqRH

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: 周二，来自四个国家的四名宇航员搭乘 SpaceX 公司的飞机返回地球，结束了为期半年的国际空间站任务。
item.description:
Four astronauts from four countries caught a lift back to Earth with SpaceX on Tuesday to end a half-year mission to the International Space Station. https://t.co/yOYEqmIIYx

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: 前纽约大都会队和洋基队球星达里尔-斯特劳伯里（Darryl Strawberry）因心脏病发作正在医院康复。
item.description:
Former New York Mets and Yankees star Darryl Strawberry is recovering from a heart attack in the hospital. https://t.co/xQErfTzFhT

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: 前特别顾问罗伯特-赫尔（Robert Hur）说，他的调查虽然发现了前总统拜登以私人身份保留机密文件的证据，但并没有 "找出证据，达到排除合理怀疑的程度"。
item.description:
Former special counsel Robert Hur says his investigation, while finding evidence that former Pres. Biden retained classified documents as a private citizen, did not "identify evidence that rose to the level of proof beyond a reasonable doubt." https://t.co/1VaVlbzxbG pic.twitter.com/gXKPl5QFdD

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: 杰里-纳德勒众议员说，拜登总统在与特别顾问罗伯特-赫尔面谈时 "可能犯了一两个口误"。"我不确定这些是否重要，因为面谈结束后，赫尔先生完全为拜登总统开脱了责任。
item.description:
Rep. Jerry Nadler says Pres. Biden "probably committed a verbal slip or two" during his interview with special counsel Robert Hur.

"I'm not sure any of that matters because when the interview was over, Mr. Hur completely exonerated Pres. Biden." https://t.co/uacd35091O pic.twitter.com/s4lbjNMPwu

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: 去年，抢劫邮递员的案件数量再次增加，受伤人数几乎翻了一番--即使美国邮政总局发起了旨在解决邮政犯罪问题的打击行动。
item.description:
The number of robberies of postal carriers grew again last year, with the number of injuries nearly doubling — even as the USPS launched a crackdown aimed at addressing postal crime. https://t.co/964QZ9Jw9x

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: 乔丹议员称，拜登总统在特别顾问关于总统保留机密文件的报告听证会上 "触犯了法律"。"但因为他是个健忘的老人，陪审团会同情他，所以胡尔先生选择不提出指控"。
item.description:
Rep. Jordan says Pres. Biden "broke the law" at hearing on special counsel's report on the president's retention of classified documents.

"But because he's a forgetful old man who would appear sympathetic to a jury, Mr. Hur chose not to bring charges." https://t.co/1VaVlbzxbG pic.twitter.com/gFUqJA9Zbx

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：经过长达数天的搜捕，马萨诸塞州一名母亲和她 11 岁的女儿被枪杀的嫌犯已被警方拘留。
item.description:
JUST IN: After a dayslong manhunt, a suspect has been taken into custody in the fatal shooting of a mother and her 11-year-old daughter in Massachusetts, authorities said. https://t.co/YYxIvT0u59

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: 你的汽车可能在监视你，这听起来像是科幻电影里的情节--但根据一项新的调查，你的汽车可能在记录你的驾驶习惯，以确定你的保险费用。
item.description:
The idea that your car could be spying on you might sound like something out of a sci-fi movie — but according to a new investigation, your car may be recording your driving habits to determine your insurance costs. https://t.co/XvD8qdaF75 pic.twitter.com/l8yZchTpoa

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: 罗伯特-赫尔（Robert Hur）作为特别顾问对拜登总统处理机密文件一事进行了长达一年的调查，最终免除了总统的法律责任，他今天将面对众议院司法委员会成员的提问。
item.description:
Robert Hur, who as special counsel conducted the yearlong probe into Pres. Biden's handling of classified documents that ultimately absolved the president of legal culpability, will face questions today from members of the House Judiciary Committee. https://t.co/zmSVbMn8Hv

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: 埃里克-卡门（Eric Carmen）是一位歌手/作曲家，以《饥饿的眼睛》（Hungry Eyes）、《几乎是天堂》（Almost Paradise）和《我一个人》（All By Myself）等歌曲而闻名，他的家人在其官方网站上宣布，他已经去世。享年 74 岁。
item.description:
Eric Carmen, the singer/songwriter known for hits like "Hungry Eyes," "Almost Paradise," and "All By Myself," has died, his family announced on his official website. He was 74. https://t.co/JurIDE1ovp pic.twitter.com/ZjAArxi7i1

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: 三年前，俄勒冈州将少量非法药物（从芬太尼到甲基苯丙胺再到快克）非刑罪化。但随着波特兰等城市无家可归者露宿街头吸毒人数激增，一些人开始重新考虑这项法律。
item.description:
Three years ago, Oregon decriminalized small amounts of illicit drugs, from fentanyl to methamphetamine to crack.

But some are having second thoughts about the law, as cities like Portland see a surge in homeless people camped in the streets using drugs. https://t.co/ZoLOmcjC9J

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: "我们做这些风筝是为了忘记苦难"：@ABC News 在拉法采访了流离失所的巴勒斯坦儿童，他们在放飞自制的风筝中找到了慰藉，而周围的冲突却在肆虐。
item.description:
"We made these kites so we can forget about our suffering": @ABC News meets displaced Palestinian children in Rafah, who find solace in flying home-made kites as conflict rages around them. https://t.co/oTfXTbxp0b pic.twitter.com/VPmMguSnF5

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: 大学、博物馆面临归还美洲原住民遗骸的新压力。
item.description:
Universities, museums face new pressure to return Native American human remains. https://t.co/hpdYLfogtV

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: 新消息：美国劳工统计局（Bureau of Labor Statistics）的报告显示，2月份的消费者物价与一年前相比上涨了3.2%，比上月略有上升。
item.description:
NEW: Consumer prices rose 3.2% in February compared to a year ago, increasing slightly from the previous month, a report from the Bureau of Labor Statistics showed. https://t.co/ISo9EZNcrd pic.twitter.com/xO6B9NWT7F

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: 新消息：2月份消费者物价与一年前相比上涨了3.2%，比上月略有上升，这是降低通胀的进展遇到困难的最新迹象。
item.description:
NEW: Consumer prices rose 3.2% in February compared to a year ago, increasing slightly from the previous month and offering the latest sign that progress toward lowering inflation has struck a rough patch. https://t.co/FNXfXoY195

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: 一名 68 岁的男子在佛罗里达大沼泽地翻船后被鳄鱼咬伤，他试图在船下沉时游上岸。
item.description:
A 68-year-old man was bitten by a crocodile after his boat capsized in the Florida Everglades and he tried to swim to shore while his boat was sinking. https://t.co/VBlQyLrbXe pic.twitter.com/LcfV1zwRF8

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: 泰勒-斯威夫特（Taylor Swift）在迪斯尼+版 "Taylor Swift | The Eras Tour (Taylor's Version) "中的四首原声音乐中的第一首已经曝光。斯威夫特在 @GMA 上抢先播放了这首歌曲。
item.description:
The first of Taylor Swift's four acoustic tracks featured in the Disney+ version of "Taylor Swift | The Eras Tour (Taylor's Version)" has been revealed.

Swift gave a sneak peek of the track, which was shown on @GMA. https://t.co/Ahogfcj8xb

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: 新消息：拜登总统与调查其机密信息处理情况的特别顾问的谈话记录与总统对其子博-拜登死于脑癌的描述相矛盾。
item.description:
NEW: A transcript of Pres. Biden's interview with the special counsel who investigated his handling of classified information contradicts the president's characterization of an exchange about the death of his son, Beau Biden, from brain cancer. https://t.co/x8wVBxHrQS pic.twitter.com/rCCAciDGXi

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: 一架从澳大利亚飞往新西兰的飞机在突然坠落前发生了 "强烈晃动"，官员们正在调查是什么原因造成了这一现象，一名乘客描述了当时的狂野情景，没有系安全带的人被从座位上扔了下来，有些人还撞上了飞机的天花板。
item.description:
As officials probe what caused a “strong shake” before a sudden plunge on a plane traveling from Australia to New Zealand, a passenger described a wild ride, with people without seatbelts thrown from their seats and some crashing into the plane's ceiling. https://t.co/eUuZel687L pic.twitter.com/vRLffPRmno

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: 新消息：拜登总统与调查其机密信息处理情况的特别顾问的谈话记录与总统对其子博-拜登死于脑癌的描述相矛盾。
item.description:
NEW: A transcript of Pres. Biden's interview with the special counsel who investigated his handling of classified information contradicts the president's characterization of an exchange about the death of his son, Beau Biden, from brain cancer. https://t.co/5PbgDXUrBI

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024
